title: Large Language Model Symptom Identification from Clinical Text: A Multi-Center Study

abstract: Recognition of patient symptoms is core to medicine, research, and public health. We tested four large language models (LLMs) identifying 11 symptoms of infectious respiratory diseases from emergency department notes (N= 204). Each LLM …
